name: ArkWorld
description: ArkWorld is an UGC metaverse that provides resources and land parallel to reality, with a core focus on creators and players. With ArkWorld's built-in creative tool PocketInvEditor. Players can edit games, museums, concerts, social gatherings, shopping and more. LAND is owned by the player, and anyone can experience it or build it, and earn from it. And AKW is the proof of interest that constitutes ArkWorld.
